name: Magders
description:
Well, you got a promotion and your new job is a controller of the Magnetic-Loader (Magder).Hurry up and don't miss up a contract!Controls: 
  • Left Joystick - Magnet Rotation;
  •  Left Joytick: Finger Down- Magnetize;
  • Left Joystick: Finger Up - Push;
  • Right Joystick - Movement
